item.title: Deceit â€“ Why there is a 99% chance that you are deceitful.
item.description: What is Deceit? Deception or falsehood is an act or statement which misleads, hides the truth, or promotes a belief, concept, or idea that is not true. It is often done for personal gain or advantage. - Wikipedia Most people expect their conversations with their close friends, family members and other strangers to be frank and honest. We feel like we are entitled to know about everything, even minute details.
